org.springframework.core.Constants.ConstantException

  • ??Constants.ConstantException???? 
    ??? ??
    org.springframework.core
    Provides basic classes for exception handling and version detection, and other core helpers that are not specific to any part of the framework.

    • org.springframework.core?Constants.ConstantException???

      ??Constants.ConstantException?org.springframework.core???? 
      ?????? ?????
      Number Constants.asNumber(String code)
      Return a constant value cast to a Number.
      Object Constants.asObject(String code)
      Parse the given String (upper or lower case accepted) and return the appropriate value if it's the name of a constant field in the class that we're analysing.
      String Constants.asString(String code)
      Return a constant value as a String.
      String Constants.toCode(Object value, String namePrefix)
      Look up the given value within the given group of constants.
      String Constants.toCodeForProperty(Object value, String propertyName)
      Look up the given value within the group of constants for the given bean property name.
      String Constants.toCodeForSuffix(Object value, String nameSuffix)
      Look up the given value within the given group of constants.
